name: White Pearl
description: White Pearl is a 35 hour RPG journey told over a large main cast with several villains. It is a turn-based RPG replete with content, in-depth combat and strategies. With their destinies already written, will calamity be prevented a fifth time?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.3 GHz Intel Pentium 4 1.3 GHz (Willamette) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: On-Board Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: On-Board Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Pentium 4 equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: On-Board Sound Card Additional Notes: The game takes up 1.5G of RAM at most, and it's very RAM heavy. You'll want some extra disk space and an internet connection as updates will be released.
